text: Seïdou Mama Sika (born 1949 in Nikki, Benin) was the Minister of the Interior of Benin from February 9, 2005 until April 2006. He attended the Lycée Technique in Coulibaly. He became an air brigade general in 1999. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Benin
title: Seïdou Mama Sika
